name: The Land of the Scurvy Dog
name_original: The Land of the Scurvy Dog
description:
The Land of the Scurvy Dog is a linear 3D platformer made in the spirit of classics like Crash Bandicoot, Sly Cooper and Rayman.

Jump into the boots of an adventurous pirate corgi and venture the seven seas in search of the greatest treasure known to dog. Experience the joy of movement through smooth controls, conquer numerous platforming challenges and collect as much treasure as you can!

Use your canine instincts to help overcome obstacles on your quest; with the push of a button you can switch between Walk Mode and Dog Mode while playing. In Walk Mode you are ready for combat and able pull off double-jumps and precise platforming. In Dog Mode you're far more agile and you can fit through tight spaces. Use these modes together and you can accomplish anything!

Controls (Keyboard / Xbox 360 controller):
Movement: W,A,S,D / Left stick
Camera: Mouse / Right stick
Jump: Space / A
Attack: Left click / X
Mode switch: Shift / Y
Bark: Right click / B

The use of a controller is strongly recommended!

This game is strictly a demo, or a prototype at this point; free for anyone to play and evaluate. As a group of gamedev students, we'd greatly appreciate any kind of feedback you might have! Leave your thoughts and feedback ( and cookies :3 ) on the comments below.
